title: derma e Deep Wrinkle Peptide Moisturizer Crème, 2 Ounce
description: This double action moisturizing crème with two powerful peptides Palmitoyl Pentapeptide (Matrixyl™) and Acetyl Hexapeptide (Argireline®), saturates skin with nutrients and visibly softens even the deepest lines and wrinkles.

title: derma e DMAE Alpha Lipoic C-Ester Serum, 2 fl oz (60 ml) (Pack of 2)
description: No animal testing. Widely-acclaimed DMAE and Alpha Lipoic Acid are combined with C-Ester in this nourishing and silky light formula that both hydrates your skin and improves its elasticity. An intensive firming treatment that can be used in combination with other derma e moisturizers to enhance their effect. may also be used alone for those with oily or blemish-prone skin. Made in USA.

title: derma e Firming Moisturizer, DMAE- Alpha Lipoic - C-Ester, 2 oz (56 g) (Pack of 2)
description: Widely-acclaimed DMAE and alpha Lipoic Acid are combined with C-Ester in this rich moisturizing formula that both hydrates your skin and improves its elasticity. Please note: Contains 1% of alpha Lipoic acid. May cause tingling when applied. No animal testing. Made in USA.
